title: swift.uvot.position
description: GCN Notice schema for Swift UVOT position notices (packet type 81: SWIFT_UVOT_POSITION). The UVOT position notice is issued when the UVOT ground software has determined the position and magnitude of the burst/afterglow in the specified filter. The position error (ra_dec_error) is derived from the high-precision hi_prec_err field (bin[16]) in centi-arcsec units, which includes both statistical and systematic contributions.

magnitude.description: Magnitude of the burst/afterglow in the specified UVOT filter. Derived from burst_mag (bin[9]) converted from centi-mag units (value × 1e-2).

magnitude_error.description: Uncertainty in the magnitude value in the specified UVOT filter. Derived from mag_error (bin[20]) converted from centi-mag units (value × 1e-2).

uvot_xrt_distance.description: Angular distance between the UVOT position and the associated XRT position, in degrees. Derived from uvot-xrt (bin[21]) converted from 0.0001-deg units (value × 1e-4).
